title._content: Image taken from page 11 of 'Divine Peace. A selection of poems by A. F. Purdon, H. M. Warner and others. [With illustrations.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Divine Peace. A selection of poems by A. F. Purdon, H. M. Warner and others. [With illustrations.]" Author: PURDON, A. F. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11651.l.8." Page: 11 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1888 Publisher: J. E. Hawkins Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003009434 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
